title: Fix the bug with sequence submission
Create hooks onSubmit etc.
Deal with clash of CSS - shadow DOM or something else
Improve the docs, provide a link to it.
Publish an NPM package
Widget customisation
body:
The following options should be customisable:

- [x] header text
- [x] search examples
- [x] search results should link to the member database (miRBase for example)

title: Facet logic
body:
When clicking the options **within the same facet**, the logic should be **OR**.  But when clicking on **different facets**, the logic should be **AND**.

Example: https://reactome.org/content/query?q=microrna&species=Homo+sapiens

title: Facets customisation
body: Allow the user to enable/disable facet

title: Css customisation
body: Allow the user to change the color of texts and buttons

title: For each sequence, two searches
body: One search for the chosen database, for example miRBase, and the other search for RNAcentral. Add a link to the RNAcentral search results in the widget.

title: Register the user's interaction/activity with a web page element
body:
Setup the Google Analytics to track clicks on:

- [ ] The `"Load more"` button
- [x] Facet items

title: Start the search instantly without having to click Search if you click on an example link
Add other info to the drop-down menu used by batch queries
body: maybe the fasta header and/or the status of the query

title: Show a progress bar
Review the distance between the texts of the facets
Add error handling
Allow the user to enter more than one sequence in the search box
Set custom environment variables
body: We need routes to the dev and prod server and we need to register the appropriate EBI endpoint for each one

title: Leave some facets collapsed by default
Review the number of downloaded sequences
body: The file available for download sometimes shows a smaller number of sequences than the one displayed on the screen

title: Repeated sequences
body: Batch queries and text search are rendered twice, increasing the number of sequences in the download file

title: Review how example sequences are generating the secondary structure
body: Maybe I'm not deleting the template used when the user clicks a second link from example

title: Add license info
body: RNAcentral will be moving to the Creative Commons Zero license next release.

title: Create fields to add query subrange
body: This was a suggestion from a user to get around the 7000 nucleotide limitation. So the user can enter any sequence and search by sub-region. Maybe we should create an advanced search option. We could set default values as 0-7000.

title: Use nightingale webcomponents for Rfam hits
body: The EBI web components (https://ebi-webcomponents.github.io/nightingale/#/) are very nice. We could use them to show Rfam hits in a more visual way. We should replace the table with the sequence feature viewer. It would also be nice to show where the matching sequences map to the sequence as well.

title: Widget should clearly show sequence errors
body: Sometimes users put in incorrect sequences (invalid characters, bad format etc). The front end should provide a clear messages on what the issues are. If given an invalid character it should say which characters are invalid. Given a bad format it should state that the format should be fasta, or just a plain sequence.

title: Create a way to use custom URLs for search results
body: miRBase is rebuilding the website and needs a way to change the format of the URLs that the search results link to. We can create a parameter to change the URL fetched from the search index, this will allow them to keep both old and new versions of the site running concurrently for a while
